 2003-02842003-02-24,  EC,  F&O,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of the Environment Act
Department of Fisheries and Oceans Act
PrecisAuthority to enter into the CANADA-QUEBEC AGREEMENT ON THE ST. LAWRENCE ACTION PLAN which provides for the implementation of a plan aimed at protecting the St. Lawrence River ecosystem and human health, and at involving communities along the river in decision-making at the local level.
